content:
NanoString nCounter - Gene Expression Analysis

Bioinformatics pipeline for processing and analyzing NanoString nCounter gene expression data. Provides standardized quality control with NACHO and data normalization to generate reproducible gene expression results across multiple samples.

What is NanoString Analysis?

NanoString nCounter technology enables digital counting of individual mRNA molecules without amplification. This pipeline automates the processing from raw RCC files to normalized expression matrices with comprehensive quality metrics.

Key Features

  • Automated QC: NACHO-based quality assessment
  • Data Normalization: Multiple normalization strategies
  • Count Table Generation: Sample metadata integration
  • Quality Reports: Comprehensive MultiQC summaries
  • Reproducible Workflow: Containerized for consistency
  • Multi-Infrastructure: Runs on any compute platform

Pipeline Workflow

  1. Data Import: Read NanoString RCC files
  2. Quality Control: NACHO assessment of technical metrics
  3. Normalization: Apply geometric mean and housekeeping gene normalization
  4. Count Matrix: Generate sample-by-gene expression matrix
  5. Metadata Integration: Combine expression with sample information
  6. Quality Reporting: MultiQC report generation

Scientific Applications

  • Gene Expression Studies: Quantify transcript abundance
  • Biomarker Validation: Targeted gene panel analysis
  • Clinical Research: Diagnostic and prognostic markers
  • Drug Response: Treatment effect profiling
  • Disease Signatures: Molecular classification

Quality Control Metrics

  • Positive Control Linearity: Assess assay performance
  • Binding Density: Evaluate hybridization efficiency
  • Imaging QC: Field of view registration
  • Limit of Detection: Sensitivity assessment
  • Housekeeping Genes: Stability evaluation

Advantages

  • Direct Counting: No amplification bias
  • Standardized QC: Automated quality metrics
  • Reproducible: Containerized workflow
  • Flexible: Works with various nCounter systems
  • Comprehensive Reports: Publication-ready figures

Input Requirements

  • RCC Files: NanoString raw count files
  • Sample Sheet: CSV with sample metadata
  • Optional: Custom normalization factors

Main Outputs

  • Normalized Counts: Sample-by-gene expression matrix
  • QC Metrics: Comprehensive quality assessment
  • NACHO Reports: Detailed quality control plots
  • MultiQC Summary: Integrated quality metrics
  • Metadata Tables: Sample information with QC flags

Perfect for: Gene Expression • NanoString • Biomarker Validation • Clinical Research • Targeted Panels
